case.state: W-Wait... did I say that out loud?! No! Please don't tell Nintendo that I broke character!
Dammit.. this is getting serious for me now..
I've done it... now it's your turn...
Completely normal... just keep telling yourself that this is completely normal...
T-That thing is bigger than the master sword...
I feel like I found the boss key...
Wait... you're not really going to...
And now I can see the path...
Fine... on with the game then...
Don't worry, it's not that bad...
Sorry ~name~, I guess it's your turn...
Wait... you're not really going to...
Sorry ~name~, I guess it's your turn...
For some reason I'm reminded of Sheik... I wonder what he's up to...
I have no problems with this...
When are you going to stop, ~name~?
Oh... uh... I guess you have to?
Even with this, it's nice to be able to talk out loud for once.
Even losing, it's nice to be able to talk out loud for once.
I guess that's what this place is though... somewhere for us fictional characters to let our hair down for once...
You know, it's tough being this handsome and not being allowed to talk.
I hope you can't see how excited I am, ~name~...
I've done it... now it's your turn...
Completely normal... just keep telling yourself that this is completely normal...
T-That thing is bigger than the master sword...
I feel like I found the boss key...
Wait... you're not really going to...
I hope you can't see how excited I am, ~name~...
And now I can see the path...
Fine... on with the game then...
Don't worry, it's not that bad...
Sorry ~name~, I guess it's your turn...
Wait... you're not really going to...
Sorry ~name~, I guess it's your turn...
For some reason I'm reminded of Sheik... I wonder what he's up to...
I have no problems with this...
When are you going to stop, ~name~?
Oh... uh... I guess you have to?
And take off most of our clothes...
My games don't usually contain nudity...
My games don't usually contain nudity.....
I am a bit embarrased about this game's... effect on me.
I guess this game is already rated M... so why not?
I hope you can't see how excited I am, ~name~...
I'm naked already... don't sweat this too much...
Completely normal... just keep telling yourself that this is completely normal...
T-That thing is bigger than the master sword...
Oh... are you talking off your...
And you'll be naked like me... eventually...
I'm naked and you're still taking off trinkets...
You can look at me... if it helps...
I hope you can't see how excited I am, ~name~...
Gotta think of something of else for a moment... or I might finish the game a little early...
Are you running out of clothes, ~name~?
I'm naked and you're still taking off trinkets...
Don't worry, you won't be alone...
Just don't look at me, please...
This is just how the game goes, ~name~...
This is just how the game goes, ~name~...
How do you even have that left?
For some reason I'm reminded of Sheik... I wonder what he's up to...
Please take off something a little... more important...
Are you running out of clothes, ~name~?
Today has been a good day...
I have no problems with this...
When are you going to stop, ~name~?
Hopefully, only a few rounds left...
Well... I did get myself into this...
But I guess there is no point in hiding it...
I-I'm... not sure I'm comfortable with this...
At least I'm not the first...
Not now... I'm in the middle of something...
H-How do you even... manage with that?!
Boss key obtained... on approach to final boss...
Is it okay if I look at you looking at me looking at you?
Just don't look at me, please...
I guess I'll just look over there then...
Do you mind turning towards me for a bit?
At least it's not too distracting...
Do you mind turning towards me for a bit?
Not really what I was hoping for...
Today has been a good day...
But this is a good start...
I should take my time... don't want to make this a "speedrun"...
People watch me all the time... I'm just not usually doing this...
Sorry... but I'm glad you lost ~name~...
I'm naked already... don't sweat this too much...
But I really hope you keep losing...
Something something... master sword... I'm too tired for this...
Wait... you're not really going to...
Sorry... but I'm glad you lost ~name~...
Are you running out of clothes, ~name~?
I wish I had seen those a bit earlier...
This is just how the game goes, ~name~...
This is just how the game goes, ~name~...
How do you even have that left?
I wish I had seen those a bit earlier...
Not really what I was hoping for...
I don't mean to root against you...
Today has been a good day...
Now I get to see you a bit exposed, ~name~
When are you going to stop, ~name~?
C-Congratulations ~name~, I hope everyone had fun!

epilogue.gender: "male", "female", or "any". This is the gender of player that can see the ending
epilogue.title: This is the title of the character's ending, and the start of a new ending

screen.img: filename (including extension) of the background image for a screen. Also the start of a new screen

text.x: The x-position of the text box. Specifically, the position of the text box's left side. This can be a percentage, or the word "centered"
text.y: The y-position of the top of the text box. Must be a percentage.
text.width: The width of a text box. This is optional. Must be a percentage.
text.arrow: "up", "down", "left", or "right". Gives the text box a dialogue arrow in the specified direction. Can be left out, if you don't want the text box to be an arrow.
text.content: The text in the text box.
This is text that will be seen by the player. It has a width of 34% and an arrow pointing down.
This is a centered text box. It has the default width and an arrow pointing right.
This third text box has minimum amount of values specified. It uses the default width, and has no arrow.
